page.title: Simple Example Using Redis Keys
page.description: Redis can be used to get/set keys/value pairs.

section.example:
dim redis as extension::RedisClient = extension::RedisClient::CreateClient() dim key as extension::RedisResult key = redis.Get("MyMessage") ? key.type = "Nil" ? key.valueString = ""
redis.set("MyMessage","Hello world") key = redis.Get("MyMessage") ? key.type = "String" ? key.valueString = "Hello world"
redis.Del("MyMessage") key = redis.Get("MyMessage") ? key.type = "Nil" ? key.valueString = ""
